result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

Defendant in custody.
State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  Defendant plead to charges in 15 CF 319.  Motion granted.

Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan J. GREETAN
Current: 13017 County Road R, Maribel, WI 54227 United States  (Effective: 07-22-2015)
Prior: 1305 S. 15th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220

Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with District Attorney set for 08-21-15 at 9:00 a.m.  Plea date is set for 10-14-15 at 10:30 a.m.  
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Deefendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.  Initial appearance is reset to 07-20-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with Manitowoc Walmart.   Bail furnished.  
Minutes.
